{"id":1026252160,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1692497997,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1026252160/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make String a Subsequence Using Cyclic Increments","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    map<char,int>mp1;\n    map<char,int>mp2;\n    bool canMakeSubsequence(string s, string t) {\n\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            mp1[s[i]]++;\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<t.length();i++){\n            mp2[t[i]]++;\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<t.length();i++){\n            if(t[i]!='a'){\n                if(mp1[t[i]]>0){\n                   mp1[t[i]]--; \n                }else if(mp1[t[i]-1]>0){\n                    mp1[t[i]-1]--;\n                }else return false;\n            }else{\n                char c='z';\n                char d='a';\n                if(mp1[c]>0){\n                    mp1[c]--;\n                }else if(mp1[d]>0){\n                    mp1[d]--;\n                } else return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-string-a-subsequence-using-cyclic-increments","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
